action/0.txt::4.text: What was the last one you saw?

action/0.txt::5.text: Could you call Guardians of the Galaxy 2 action?

action/0.txt::8.text: What did you think of the movie?

action/0.txt::9.text: I thought it was pretty good.

action/1.txt::2.text: A fight with bruce lee and Bruce willis.

action/1.txt::5.text: I think it is pretty obvious.

action/1.txt::8.text: I do not know Willis is pretty tough.

action/1.txt::9.text: But he is nothing compared to lee.

action/2.txt::1.text: I love action movies.  Especially the 90's etc.

action/2.txt::2.text: I loved action movies with Arnold, Stallion, Van Damn, and Segal.

action/2.txt::3.text: What about Blade, with Wesley Snips?

action/2.txt::4.text: Those were awesome movies.  He kicked ass in them.

action/2.txt::5.text: I also am a big fan of Jason Stathem, Jet Lee, Jackie Chan, etc.

action/2.txt::6.text: Good call, those guys are great.  I love Stathem in the last Fast and Furious movie.

action/2.txt::7.text: He was funny in it and kicked the hell out of everyone.

action/2.txt::8.text: The Rock is one of my favorite all time action heroes.

action/2.txt::9.text: He was good in the fast and furious movies, Central Intelligence, etc.

action/3.txt::0.text: Are you excited about the latest Transformers movie, The Last Knight?

action/3.txt::1.text: Not really, Michael Bay really lost me after the second one, Revenge of the Fallen.

action/3.txt::2.text: Revenge of the Fallen was so bad. The action sequences were good in it and I didn't mind Shia Labeouf's constant screaming or Megan Fox's sex appeal but the heavy inclusion of his parents was too much.

action/3.txt::3.text: I agree, the stuff with his parents and the brownies, as well as all the unnecessary scenes with the dogs were off putting. The story line itself was a mess.

action/3.txt::4.text: I can see why you gave up on the Transformers franchise. Michael Bay is going to give you action but nobody has ever said he knew how to work together a good concept to present through all those explosions and crashes.

action/3.txt::5.text: That's exactly the problem with the Transformers films. I want to watch the films for Optimus, Bumblebee, Megatron, not for the parents or Shia's love life problems.

action/3.txt::6.text: I can't argue about that although I think the 3rd Transformers film, Dark of the Moon was pretty decent. Definitely a good bounce back from Revenge of the Fallen.

action/3.txt::7.text: I haven't watched it but it has Rosie Huntington and Patrick Duffy right?

action/3.txt::8.text: Yeah Rosie replaced Megan Fox as Sam, or Shia's love interest. John Malkovich is also in the movie, but he plays more of a comic relief role.

action/3.txt::9.text: I love John Malkovich especially in Being John Malkovich, and I think he's such a respectable actor that I almost watched Dark of the Moon for him but I wasn't sold because Michael Bay was directing.

baseball/0.txt::0.text: Did you see the Yankees vs Redsox game?

baseball/0.txt::11.text: Yes, not as many strikeouts, but he held them to one run in 7 innings.

baseball/0.txt::12.text: The Redsox hitters couldnt square up any of his pitches.

baseball/0.txt::13.text: I know, he changed speeds and locations very well, avoiding hard contact.

baseball/0.txt::14.text: The Defense was great on both sides, especially the Jackie Bradley Jr catch.

baseball/0.txt::15.text: Yes, hes a great center fielder.  Ellsbury also made a nice play in center.

baseball/0.txt::16.text: The umpires were very fair as well.

baseball/0.txt::17.text: Ya, i like his strikezone.  it was very consistent.

baseball/0.txt::2.text: I cant believe it went into extra innings.

baseball/0.txt::3.text: Yea, the bullpens pitched great though.

baseball/0.txt::4.text: Chris Sale pitched a great game.

baseball/0.txt::5.text: Ya, he was on all night.

baseball/0.txt::7.text: Ya, the only blemish was the two run homerun by sanchez.

baseball/0.txt::8.text: Yep, He hung that one slider.

baseball/0.txt::9.text: One bad pitch is all it takes sometimes.

baseball/1.txt::0.text: Did you see the Tigers play the Rangers last night?

baseball/1.txt::10.text: I wish I knew what was holding them back.  They have some great players!

baseball/1.txt::11.text: Yeah they do.  I'm a big fan of Verlander.

baseball/1.txt::12.text: Oh me too!  He's a favorite but I like Cabrera better.

baseball/1.txt::13.text: Wouldn't it be great if they got it together and won the world series?

baseball/1.txt::14.text: Yeah it would.  When was the last time they held that title?

baseball/1.txt::15.text: I think it was back in 1984.

baseball/1.txt::16.text: Wow!  That long ago huh?  I think they've held the World Series title only 4 times.

baseball/1.txt::17.text: I think they could do it again.  It wasn't that long ago that it looked like a good possibility that they would go far again.

baseball/1.txt::18.text: Well, if they are going to get any title, they need to bring a stronger game.

baseball/1.txt::2.text: What was the final score? I didn't see the end of the game.

baseball/1.txt::4.text: Too bad they lost!  Don't they play the Rangers again today?

baseball/1.txt::6.text: I'll have to watch that game.  I think next week they play the Astros.

baseball/1.txt::7.text: I think so too.  So when I was watching the game the tigers only had 2 runs.  When did they get the third?

baseball/1.txt::8.text: They didn't get the third run until the 9th inning.

baseball/1.txt::9.text: Too bad they didn't pull it together a little sooner. Tigers usually play pretty well, but this season isn't going so good.

baseball/2.txt::0.text: Have you heard about the Knuckleballer who is the 1st woman in West Coast League?

baseball/2.txt::1.text: Now would it be sexist if we slap her butt after a good outing, Dee?".

baseball/2.txt::10.text: I know. Legend has it that she struck out Babe Ruth and Lou Gehrig in the same inning.

baseball/2.txt::11.text: And the next day the commissioner voided her contract and declared that women were not fit to play baseball because it would take too much of a toll on their bodies or something like that.

baseball/2.txt::12.text: Yeah. They banned us women from the MLB until the '90s.

baseball/2.txt::13.text: You know what he was probably thinking at the time.

baseball/2.txt::14.text: Women need to say in the kitchen where they belong".

baseball/2.txt::15.text: Not to be sexist or anything but I don't see why women would want to play professional baseball. All of that pitching isn't good for men.

baseball/2.txt::16.text: So you think Babe Ruth was right?

baseball/2.txt::18.text: Babe Ruth said something to the effect that women were too delicate and liable to get hurt if they played baseball.

baseball/2.txt::19.text: I think baseball is hard on anybody's body. Man or woman.

baseball/2.txt::3.text: Really/ I thought you were joking.

baseball/2.txt::5.text: Awesome! If a woman ever makes it to MLB, this is how it'll happen.

baseball/2.txt::6.text: I hope to see it someday.

baseball/2.txt::7.text: And I hope she succeeds unless she plays for the Cardinals, in which case I hope she's awful.

baseball/2.txt::8.text: I'm sorry, did you just imply that a pitcher that came up with the Cardinals that should otherwise have only an outside chance at being on an MLB roster would be unaffected by our devil magic?

baseball/2.txt::9.text: You know Jackie Mitchell was the first female player to play professional baseball.

baseball/3.txt::0.text: Hey whats chilling i am at the cubs game and it is pretty chill.

baseball/3.txt::1.text: Your at a cubs game no way how?

baseball/3.txt::10.text: Yeah it is pretty good and their are still over 5 innings left.

baseball/3.txt::11.text: Well at least they are doing well i planned to record the game tonight so i can watch it later.

baseball/3.txt::12.text: That was my plan but i got this and i actually got a ball  that got hit into the stand.

baseball/3.txt::13.text: You gotta get Perez to sign it.

baseball/3.txt::14.text: I did not think about that but that is an excellent idea.

baseball/3.txt::15.text: You should also get Michaels to sign it too.

baseball/3.txt::17.text: It would also make a good souvenir for the baseball collection.

baseball/3.txt::18.text: I do need to get more memorbillia for baseball and this is a perfect start.

baseball/3.txt::19.text: Exactly and it will be a unique item in your collection.

baseball/3.txt::2.text: I won some tickets and i have been dying to go to a game this season.

baseball/3.txt::3.text: Yeah i am definitely jealous of you.

baseball/3.txt::4.text: You should stop by  maybe get a ticket.

baseball/3.txt::5.text: Nah i cannot afford that how is the game going currently.

baseball/3.txt::6.text: Currently the score is pretty intense.

baseball/3.txt::8.text: Every oufield guy is picking it up like mines and giving them no time it is a riot.

basketball/0.txt::0.text: How about that young talent on the sixers?

basketball/0.txt::1.text: Yea, but Embiid can't stay healthy.

basketball/0.txt::10.text: What if we get Lowry. Then will you believe?

basketball/0.txt::11.text: I might. That would be a good pickup, but he wants a lot of money.

basketball/0.txt::12.text: Hes coming off his best year at age 31. Give him the money.

basketball/0.txt::13.text: I guess but dont go crazy.

basketball/0.txt::14.text: Add Lowry to that core and you're in the playoffs. No?

basketball/0.txt::15.text: I dont know about that, but maybe.

basketball/0.txt::18.text: We'll see how we fare. I wanna see everyone healthy.

basketball/0.txt::2.text: Oh no, hes healthy and domiant.

basketball/0.txt::3.text: Idk but if he isnt the core doesnt look as good.

basketball/0.txt::4.text: Not even with Simmons, Saric, and maybe Jackson?

basketball/0.txt::5.text: The same Simmons who was hurt his rookie year?

basketball/0.txt::6.text: We're talking about potential here. Look at the potential of all of these guys.

basketball/0.txt::7.text: What is potential when it doesnt translate to the court.

basketball/0.txt::8.text: Look, Embiid and Simmons together isn't appealing to you?

basketball/0.txt::9.text: No, it is, but I'll believe it when I see it.

basketball/1.txt::0.text: Who is your favorite basketball player?

basketball/1.txt::1.text: Michael Jordan is my favorite basketball player.

basketball/1.txt::10.text: Do you think the Warriors are a super team that can't be beat?

basketball/1.txt::11.text: The Warriors have a lot of great players, but Lebron James and the Cavs beat them last year.

basketball/1.txt::12.text: Do you think Lebron James is still the best player in the NBA?

basketball/1.txt::13.text: Lebron James is probably the best overall player in the league at the moment.

basketball/1.txt::14.text: Do you think Lebron will surpass Michael Jordan as a player?

basketball/1.txt::15.text: If he stays healthy and continues to play on championship teams, he has a chance.

basketball/1.txt::16.text: Are you excited about the playoffs this year?

basketball/1.txt::17.text: Not to much.  Waiting for the Warriors versus the Cavs in the finals.

basketball/1.txt::18.text: Do you think the Warriors will beat the Cavs with the addition of Durant to their team?

basketball/1.txt::19.text: If Durant stays healthy, the Warriors are a very tough team to beat.  I think the Warriors will probably win the championship this year.

basketball/1.txt::2.text: Who do you think Lebron James is better than Michael Jordan?

basketball/1.txt::3.text: I think Michael Jordan is the greatest of all time, but Lebron could one day become one of the best to have ever played.

basketball/1.txt::4.text: Do you think the Golden State Warriors are the best team in the league right now?

basketball/1.txt::5.text: With Kevin Durant and Steph Curry, they are probably the best overall team this year.

basketball/1.txt::6.text: Do you think Lebron James will make it to the finals again this year?

basketball/1.txt::7.text: If his team stays healthy, it looks like they will make it to finals again to most likely face the Warriors.

basketball/1.txt::8.text: Do you think Steph Curry is a better shooter than Lebron James?

basketball/1.txt::9.text: Steph Curry seems to be a better three point shooter, but Lebron is an unstoppable scorer.

basketball/2.txt::0.text: Did you ever play basketball growing up?

basketball/2.txt::1.text: Yes, I was in the kids leagues until 8th grade or so. You?

basketball/2.txt::10.text: Yeah, parents are dumb and don't see truth a lot.

basketball/2.txt::12.text: I got to the high school level and had stopped growing. You can't play high school basketball at 5'9".

basketball/2.txt::13.text: Ha, true, unless you can dunk for the show. I was 6'1 when I quit and I wasn't tall enough anymore.

basketball/2.txt::14.text: I also had a lot of injuries.

basketball/2.txt::15.text: What did basketball do to you?

basketball/2.txt::16.text: Well, I was the fat kid, remember? Wind sprints destroyed my knees. One time I hurt them bad but my brother convinced my family I was faking it.

basketball/2.txt::18.text: They still hurt. And I have rotator cuff issues. You?

basketball/2.txt::19.text: No injuries for me, luckily. Sorry about your experiences.

basketball/2.txt::2.text: Yeah, I played until early high school. Why did you stop?

basketball/2.txt::3.text: Well, I was forced to do it in the first place. And, bullying.

basketball/2.txt::5.text: They made us play shirts vs. skins, and the team captain every time said skins for us so I'd have to be shirtless.

basketball/2.txt::7.text: So, I'm fat. The point was to humiliate me.

basketball/2.txt::9.text: Yeah, I hard-fouled him a lot. I also just wasn't very good, despite my mom's assertions.

basketball/3.txt::0.text: The Wizards defeat the Celtics here in Game 4 to tie the series.

basketball/3.txt::1.text: The series is tied at 2 a piece and game 5 will be in Boston on Wednesday.

basketball/3.txt::10.text: I like the Celtics chances, I definitely think this will go 7 games.

basketball/3.txt::11.text: I do too... and I have no clue who would win Game 7.

basketball/3.txt::12.text: I'd have to give the slight edge to the Celtics just because it will be at TD Garden in Boston.

basketball/3.txt::13.text: Yeah but John Wall has been eating the Celtics alive, hes been so crafty, getting his teammates involved, scoring a ton of points and assists.

basketball/3.txt::14.text: Only time will tell, I guess we will just have to wait and see. As we know the Cavs have already advanced to the eastern conference finals.

basketball/3.txt::15.text: That will be a tough task for either of these teams as the Cavs are undefeated so far this postseason.

basketball/3.txt::16.text: You got to think the Cavs will beat either team, and the Cavs will prob advanced to the finals.

basketball/3.txt::17.text: Yeah I think I agree with you there, and I don't think the Cavs care who they get. Lebron seems to be on a mission this year again this postseason.

basketball/3.txt::18.text: Well thank you for tuning in, again the Wizards have beat the Celtics thanks to a 26-0 run in the third quarter, to tie the series at 2 a piece.

basketball/3.txt::19.text: It's been a pleasure to be with you guys, we will see you Wednesday night in Boston for game 5!!!!!

basketball/3.txt::2.text: Yup tune in at 8 PM on TNT.

basketball/3.txt::3.text: Now its a best of 3 series, and Boston has 2 home games and only 1 away game.

basketball/3.txt::4.text: Neither team has won on the road yet this series.

basketball/3.txt::5.text: Lets see if the Wizards can take care of business Wednesday and secure the first away win of the series.

basketball/3.txt::6.text: That Celtics crowd will be loud on Wednesday night!

basketball/3.txt::7.text: Rightfully so, I think it will be an electric atmosphere, and they have every right to be.

basketball/3.txt::8.text: Did you know the Celtics have gone down at least 20+ points in every game this series.

basketball/3.txt::9.text: They are lucky to be tied in this series, and you'd have to imagine the Celtics would hopefully avoid being down 20 at home in game 5.

comedy/0.txt::0.text: Do you like the pitch perfect movies?

comedy/0.txt::2.text: I love anna kendrick and rebel wilson.

comedy/0.txt::4.text: Thos movies wouldnt be the same without her.

comedy/0.txt::5.text: I dont think they would be as funny.

comedy/0.txt::7.text: It was a good casting call getting her.

comedy/1.txt::4.text: He reminds me of my deceased dad.

comedy/1.txt::8.text: Did you see the Airplane with Anna Nicole?

comedy/1.txt::9.text: Yes that one was good too.

comedy/2.txt::0.text: What is your favorite comedy film?

comedy/2.txt::1.text: I would say Ground hog's day.

comedy/2.txt::2.text: That is an oldie but a goodie. Got to love bill murray.

comedy/2.txt::3.text: It is such a well formatted movie. So much went into the thought process of the film.

comedy/2.txt::4.text: It is interesting how he develops over time and learns all these new skills.

comedy/2.txt::5.text: I love movie that deal with time. So interesting. Also bill murray is great.

comedy/2.txt::6.text: His performance is so on the money. I also think andie macdowell made this film too.

comedy/2.txt::7.text: Don't forget about chris elliot too, he is a comedic genius as well.

comedy/2.txt::8.text: He is great. Loved him in something about mary.

comedy/2.txt::9.text: Ya that was such a good comedy movie as well.

comedy/3.txt::0.text: I just watched Me, Myself and Irene again.

comedy/3.txt::5.text: Them trying to put down the cow!

horror/0.txt::0.text: Do you like slasher horror films?

horror/0.txt::1.text: I must admit that all though the freak me out i do enough them quite a bit.

horror/0.txt::2.text: Do you have a favorite one?

horror/0.txt::3.text: I like most of the Friday the 13th movies and the Halloween movies as well.

horror/0.txt::4.text: Did you get to watch all the Scream movies?

horror/0.txt::5.text: The Scream movies are great, i love what they did with the slasher movie concept.

horror/0.txt::6.text: Yeah, having a killer that is fixated on serial killers and slasher movies is a bit of a twist on the genre.

horror/0.txt::7.text: I hope they make another one in the future.

horror/0.txt::8.text: Who knows, they will probably end up rebooting the whole franchise for the next generation of kids waiting to be terrorized.

horror/0.txt::9.text: Well i'll be on deck waiting to buy a ticket myself.

horror/1.txt::0.text: So what did you feel about the remake of the Nightmare on elm Street?

annotator_2.surface_form: the remake of the Nightmare on elm Street

horror/1.txt::5.text: The fact that Robert Englund wasn't playing Freddy was mistake number one.

horror/1.txt::6.text: Yes, that was a box office blunder.

horror/1.txt::7.text: Secondly, the retelling though not horrible wasn't quite correct with the movies lore.

horror/1.txt::8.text: What did you think about the movie effects?

horror/1.txt::9.text: That at least was the best thing about this movie.

horror/2.txt::0.text: Hey are you going to watch the Halloween horror movie marathon this weekend?

horror/2.txt::1.text: I might, how recent are the movies they are showing?

horror/2.txt::2.text: Movies from the 80's till this past year.

horror/2.txt::3.text: Awesome I'm coming over to your place then this weekend.

horror/2.txt::4.text: I really hope they show Freddy vs Jason that movie was so badass!

horror/2.txt::5.text: Omg I know.That movie was a dream come true.

horror/2.txt::6.text: Even though it got a lot of bad reviews I absolutely loved the battle between Freddy and Jason.

horror/2.txt::7.text: Yes that was some of the best parts!

horror/2.txt::8.text: I just wish they would make a sequel to that movie already.

horror/2.txt::9.text: They totally should since it was foreshadowing that Freddy was still alive.

horror/3.txt::5.text: I have to be in the mood for them.

movies/0.txt::0.text: We just rewatched the movie Fargo last night. Did you ever see it?

movies/0.txt::10.text: Yes he was great. A funny man to look at but a great actor.

movies/0.txt::11.text: I love the way they have the actors do that Minnesota accent.

movies/0.txt::12.text: Yea, and they talk real slow.

movies/0.txt::13.text: I think that was named one of the best one hundred movies of all time.

movies/0.txt::16.text: Well it should have if it wasn't.

movies/0.txt::18.text: They have a T.V. show now based on the movie.

movies/0.txt::19.text: Really, I'll have to check it out.

movies/0.txt::3.text: I think I mught have. Who is in it?

movies/0.txt::4.text: William H. Macy is the lead character.

movies/0.txt::5.text: He's the guy in Shameless right?

movies/0.txt::7.text: Yes I did see it, it was a good movie.

movies/0.txt::8.text: Yea, funny but a lot of killing too.

movies/0.txt::9.text: Steve Buscemi was a great character in that movie. I like him.

movies/1.txt::0.text: I can't remember the last time I actually sat down to watch a movie.

movies/1.txt::11.text: Yeah, but Kevin Spacey just voices a robot. Rockwell is the star of the show.

movies/1.txt::13.text: Well, I don't want to give it away, but it's totally trippy.

movies/1.txt::14.text: Trippy how? Like A Clockwork Orange?

movies/1.txt::15.text: A little, but it almost plays more like a horror in some ways. Very desolate.

movies/1.txt::17.text: Definitely! It's not really a traditional space movie.

movies/1.txt::18.text: I'll have to look into it!

movies/1.txt::19.text: You should. The score is great, too.

movies/1.txt::2.text: No, I mean, we have Netflix. But I meant in the theater.

movies/1.txt::3.text: Oh! Well it's so expensive these days.

movies/1.txt::4.text: What was the last film you saw in the theaters?

movies/1.txt::5.text: The last movie I saw at the theater was Moon.

movies/1.txt::6.text: I can't say I've ever heard of Moon.

movies/1.txt::9.text: That's just it-- it only had two actors! Kevin Spacey and Sam Rockwell.

movies/2.txt::0.text: Have you seen any of the batman films?

movies/2.txt::10.text: Actually, I haven't seen any other of his.

movies/2.txt::11.text: Me too. The Dark Knight is the only one.

movies/2.txt::12.text: I will say, the storyline in The Dark Knight Rises is really good.

movies/2.txt::13.text: I think the soundtrack from The Dark Knight makes the movie though.

movies/2.txt::15.text: He scores a lot of films that I like.

movies/2.txt::16.text: I think he put a great score together in Inception too.

movies/2.txt::17.text: Wow! I forgot about that movie!

movies/2.txt::18.text: Is it better than the batman films?

movies/2.txt::5.text: That one was good but the other 2 were much better.

movies/2.txt::6.text: I think The Dark Knight Rises was definitely my favorite.

movies/2.txt::7.text: I liked that one, but I wish the Joker was in it.

movies/2.txt::8.text: I know. Heath Ledger had a fantastic performance.

movies/2.txt::9.text: What is your favorite film that he is in?

music/0.txt::0.text: I had a really hard Guitar Lesson today!

music/0.txt::10.text: Exactly, if you don't move your fingers to the right places on the neck the end notes won't be true.

music/0.txt::12.text: It's also hard on your fingers to hold the string down and slide.

music/0.txt::13.text: I've seen some guitar players use metal tubes on their fingers to slide like that.

music/0.txt::14.text: That is another techniques that will play sliding cords but for individual notes you only use your bare fingers.

music/0.txt::16.text: They do but it looks like I'll need to practice more to build them up a bit.

music/0.txt::17.text: I've heard those sliding notes and didn't know how they were done.

music/0.txt::18.text: It's a great technique to add to my playing.

music/0.txt::19.text: I look forward to hearing you play a whole peice!

music/0.txt::2.text: My teacher taught me a new fingering technique.

music/0.txt::4.text: We worked on learning to slide my fingers down the strings after plucking to change the pitch higher or lower.

music/0.txt::5.text: I wouldn't think that was so hard.

music/0.txt::6.text: It is difficult to do accuratly when you are moving through a peice and need to move on to the next notes.

music/0.txt::7.text: Doesn't the neck of your guitar have those lines to help you?

music/0.txt::8.text: The fret marks? Yes it does but you need to press cleanly in the space so that the note plays true on the one long string vibration.

music/0.txt::9.text: Sort of like when you play a larger string instrument like the cello?

music/1.txt::0.text: Is music a good topic to talk about?

music/1.txt::11.text: Yes i love the favorites station it puts together for me.

music/1.txt::12.text: Yea i listen to iheartradio sometimes.

music/1.txt::13.text: Its the best way to listen to music for me.

music/1.txt::14.text: I like it better than pandora.

music/1.txt::15.text: Me too, i dont like pandora.

music/1.txt::17.text: It was nice talking to you.

music/1.txt::3.text: What do you listen to when youre in the car?

music/1.txt::5.text: Oh okay, i used to have that.

music/1.txt::7.text: Yes and i havent had the money to get it back yet.

music/1.txt::9.text: Yea but ive been listening to iheart radio.

music/3.txt::1.text: I've been great.  I just got a new car actually!

music/3.txt::10.text: I'm sure it is fun to listen to all those old songs.

music/3.txt::11.text: It is.  Of course, they have stations with newer songs on there as well.  I listen to those too.

music/3.txt::13.text: There are quite a few country stations that I flip through.

music/3.txt::15.text: Me too.  I love to listen to all those stations.

music/3.txt::16.text: Who is your favorite country artist?

music/3.txt::17.text: I really like to listen to Luke Bryan.

music/3.txt::18.text: Me too.  It was great talking to you.

music/3.txt::2.text: Really?  Do you like it so far?

music/3.txt::3.text: I love it.  It has sirius xm radio which I have been listening to a lot lately.

music/3.txt::4.text: What kind of stations are available?

music/3.txt::5.text: Every type of genre of music you might want to listen to is available on there.

music/3.txt::7.text: I really like the station that plays pop music from the 1990's.

music/3.txt::8.text: I would really enjoy listening to that too.

music/3.txt::9.text: It brings me back to my teenage years and what I used to listen to on the radio.

nfl_football/0.txt::0.text: Who was the best NFL coach of all time?

nfl_football/0.txt::1.text: I would have to say John Madden.

nfl_football/0.txt::10.text: Wow, that's like winning the lottery.

nfl_football/0.txt::11.text: They carry a lot of value.

nfl_football/0.txt::12.text: It would be rare to have one.

nfl_football/0.txt::13.text: It takes incredible perseverance and hard work to get that far.

nfl_football/0.txt::15.text: I've never seen a weak football player.

nfl_football/0.txt::17.text: What do you think the NFL players bench?

nfl_football/0.txt::18.text: Whatever it is would be a lot more than I could ever do or imagine.

nfl_football/0.txt::3.text: He has the highest winning percentage for a regular season.

nfl_football/0.txt::5.text: Yes, he's more famous as an announcer I think.

nfl_football/0.txt::6.text: He also has a Super Bowl Ring.

nfl_football/0.txt::8.text: Wouldn't that be awesome to have one of them.

nfl_football/0.txt::9.text: Yeah, I heard someone auctioned off their ring for $200,000.

nfl_football/1.txt::0.text: Don't you think it is strange that some states have several teams.

nfl_football/1.txt::11.text: And then I suppose New York has a couple teams.

nfl_football/1.txt::13.text: I guess I had never really thought of that.

nfl_football/1.txt::14.text: It must be strange.  How do you choose what your home team is.

nfl_football/1.txt::15.text: I suppose however you are raised usually.

nfl_football/1.txt::19.text: I suppose everyone is a Packer fan there.

nfl_football/1.txt::2.text: And then some states have no teams.

nfl_football/1.txt::5.text: They have Oakland, San Francisco, LA and San Diego right?

nfl_football/1.txt::6.text: Yeah.  Four teams in one state.

nfl_football/1.txt::7.text: What about Florida.  How many do they have?

nfl_football/1.txt::8.text: They have Jacksonville and Tampa Bay.

nfl_football/2.txt::0.text: Do you like watching football more at the stadium or at home?

nfl_football/2.txt::1.text: I think I like watching it more at home.

nfl_football/2.txt::12.text: I had an extra ticket for the Cowboys game, I thought maybe you would be interested.

nfl_football/2.txt::14.text: I thought you said you prefer to watch it at home?

nfl_football/2.txt::15.text: I do, unless I can go to a game with my best friend.

nfl_football/2.txt::17.text: What time should I be ready?

nfl_football/2.txt::3.text: Because I like watching more than one game at a time.

nfl_football/2.txt::5.text: If a game is bad or boring, I can watch a different one.

nfl_football/2.txt::6.text: I guess that's a good reason.

nfl_football/2.txt::7.text: I can also eat whatever I want, and drink whatever I want.

nfl_football/2.txt::8.text: Those $7 beers do get kind of old.

nfl_football/2.txt::9.text: I can invite whoever I want over to watch it with me, and we don't have to pay a ridiculous amount to get in.

nfl_football/3.txt::0.text: How do you think Tom Brady will do this season?

nfl_football/3.txt::1.text: He is good every year so probaly good.

nfl_football/3.txt::10.text: Wonder how good the team will be.

nfl_football/3.txt::11.text: I think they will do alright this season.

nfl_football/3.txt::12.text: Yea I just wonder if he's still got it.

nfl_football/3.txt::15.text: Father time always wins in the NFL.

nfl_football/3.txt::2.text: It seems like the guy never ages.

nfl_football/3.txt::4.text: I think he will slow down eventually and retire.

nfl_football/3.txt::5.text: They really should start giving his back up a bigger role.

nfl_football/3.txt::6.text: He gave them great minutes when Tom was out.

nfl_football/3.txt::7.text: yes, it is a shame he has to sit the bench and wait.

nfl_football/3.txt::9.text: ohh yea he is making a comeback .

pop/2.txt::0.text: Have you heard all the new Ed Sheeran songs?

pop/2.txt::1.text: I don't think I've heard them all.

pop/2.txt::2.text: Be sure to listen to Castle on the Hill.

pop/2.txt::4.text: Yes it is so emotionally powerful.

pop/2.txt::5.text: Wow I like how music can move me like that.

pop/2.txt::6.text: That's exactly what this song does, it is powerful.

pop/2.txt::8.text: Yes he writes amazing songs and sings them beautifully.

pop/2.txt::9.text: I agree, thank you for mentioning this, I am looking forward to listening to this song.

pop/3.txt::0.text: Carly Rae Jepsen might be my favorite pop artist going right now.

pop/3.txt::1.text: Yeah it's really hard to argue with the greatness of Emotion.

pop/3.txt::2.text: Yeah I feel like a lot of people wrote her off after Call Me Maybe.

pop/3.txt::3.text: Which was a definite mistake, Emotion is a pop classic.

pop/3.txt::4.text: Her new single is sounding good too.

pop/3.txt::5.text: Agreed, do you know who is producing?

pop/3.txt::6.text: I'm not sure, I know I saw Jack Antonoff's name thrown around a bit.

pop/3.txt::7.text: I don't think it's him, but I know he worked with her in the past.

pop/3.txt::8.text: So did Butch Walker so she is on a roll with collaborations.

pop/3.txt::9.text: Can't wait for her new album in full followed by a tour.

rap_hiphop/0.txt::0.text: I'm debating whether or not I should give Lecrae a listen. I've heard conflicting reports about whether he's just a Christian who happens to rap or someone who does Christian rap and I don't want anything preachy.

rap_hiphop/0.txt::1.text: He's no more preachy than any other artist. Everybody's art will be from their own perspectives and experiences and lifestyles and faith just happens to be a big part of his life.

rap_hiphop/0.txt::3.text: Yeah I've listened to his music but not lately.

rap_hiphop/0.txt::4.text: So you won't even listen to him but you're defending him?

rap_hiphop/0.txt::5.text: I do like him as a person and as an artist, and though it seems like that should mean I like his music, it just doesn't appeal to me aurally.

rap_hiphop/0.txt::7.text: The style I guess, his voice seems a lot higher pitched than anybody else I like, and I just lean towards a more old school sound.

rap_hiphop/0.txt::9.text: No not at all, give him a listen. There's bound to be content you disagree with but you'll find that with every artist.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::1.text: I love happy rap and Will Smith is a good rapper.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::2.text: Yes he never cuss in any raps.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::3.text: I loved the fresh prince theme song.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::4.text: Yes and parents just dont understand was a good one.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::6.text: Yes will smith did a good job with good music and no cussing.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::7.text: Just the 2 of us was a good song too.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::8.text: Will Smith did a good job with no cussing songs that was for the whole family.

rap_hiphop/1.txt::9.text: He is such a good rapper.

rap_hiphop/2.txt::0.text: Enough of what the critics or the community wants us to think, who is your favorite rapper or rap group of all-time?

rap_hiphop/2.txt::1.text: Tough question. It'd have to be Outkast for me.

rap_hiphop/2.txt::2.text: I miss Outkast, I really wish they'd put out another album.

rap_hiphop/2.txt::3.text: I know, it has been so long since I've heard Andre 3000 and Big Boi together. I miss them.

rap_hiphop/2.txt::4.text: I miss them too, luckily their music has resonated with so many people and that means we hear their sound all over contemporary stuff.

rap_hiphop/2.txt::5.text: Right, I was listening to To Pimp a Butterfly and Yeezus last night and thinking about how these albums would be starkly different had Outkast not existed.

rap_hiphop/2.txt::6.text: Wow, now I'm thinking about a Kendrick Lamar and Outkast collaboration. That'd be so cool.

rap_hiphop/2.txt::7.text: No man, that'd be cooler than cool, it'd be ice cold! Sorry, that was super corny of me to quote "Hey Ya!".

rap_hiphop/2.txt::8.text: Corny, but I'll take it. Is that your favorite Outkast song of all time?

rap_hiphop/2.txt::9.text: No, but it's up there. B.O.B. will probably always be my favorite, I had the good fortune to get to listen to the isolated vocals for that track and I don't know how that amount of rapping in one breath is possible.

rap_hiphop/3.txt::1.text: I hate his new music but when Wayne was apart of the Hot Boyz his music was amazing!

rap_hiphop/3.txt::2.text: Hot Boyz? I've never heard of that group before, who were they?

rap_hiphop/3.txt::3.text: Are you kidding me? Cash Money Records dude! The group was and is the hottest hip hop group of all time.

rap_hiphop/3.txt::4.text: Who else was in the group beside Lil Wayne?

rap_hiphop/3.txt::5.text: The group was only New Orleans rappers specifically Juvenile, Turk, B.G., and Lil Wayne! I can't believe you've never heard of them before.

rap_hiphop/3.txt::6.text: I've heard of Juvenile before but not B.G. and Turk.

rap_hiphop/3.txt::7.text: Yeah well Juvenile is really the only former group member who still makes decent music. B.G. is serving like 20 year prison sentence for having illegal firearms and Turk was in prison for a long time but was released not too long ago.

rap_hiphop/3.txt::8.text: That sucks. Do you think they'll ever have a reunion?

rap_hiphop/3.txt::9.text: Lil Wayne tried to have one a few years ago at some show in New Orleans but only Juvenile, Turk, and Wayne perfromed. B.G. was already locked away in prison so I guess it was a semi reunion.

rock/0.txt::0.text: Do you like the Beatles last album,Abbey road?

rock/0.txt::2.text: Me too. Could be their best.

rock/0.txt::3.text: Yea,imagine the last album you,do considered the best.

rock/0.txt::4.text: Tough to pick one as the best though.

rock/0.txt::5.text: I agree,they had so many classics.

rock/0.txt::6.text: I,think every one was a classic!

rock/0.txt::7.text: You know,I can't say I disagree.

rock/1.txt::0.text: What's your all time favorite rock band?

rock/1.txt::3.text: They had the most influence on me growing up.

rock/1.txt::5.text: I think them being a part of the Terminator 2 soundtrack really got me to pay attention to their music.

rock/1.txt::6.text: That's cool, so what would you say is you all time favorite song from them?

rock/1.txt::7.text: I'd have to say it's You Could Be Mine. I mean theres a ton of songs that I like from them but that one just has a special place.

rock/1.txt::8.text: How do you feel about their current music?

rock/1.txt::9.text: Honestly it's not as good as their stuff in the 80's but thats not to say they aren't good anymore.

rock/2.txt::0.text: Do you think Grunge Rock is Classic Rock?

rock/2.txt::2.text: Well, I remember when Grunge Rock became popular. And, it was presented as being Alternative.

rock/2.txt::4.text: It was supposed to be an Alternative to Classic Rock.

rock/2.txt::5.text: Yes, I understand. So, it's not Classic Rock?

rock/2.txt::6.text: We were told that when Grunge was first popuar.

rock/2.txt::8.text: I'm not sure. But, now, I've noticed that Classic Rock stations play Grunge Rock.

rock/2.txt::9.text: Then, I guess you just answered your own question. Grunge Rock is now Classic Rock!

rock/3.txt::0.text: I bought tickets for Lollapalooza this summer, but now my boyfriend can't go. Do you want to go with me?

rock/3.txt::1.text: Did you buy a single day pass, or a four day pass?

rock/3.txt::2.text: It's a single day pass for Friday. The tickets were $120 each.

rock/3.txt::3.text: Okay, I can go. I can pay you for the ticket next payday.

rock/3.txt::4.text: That's fine. It should be a lot of fun, I love seeing all the different bands.

rock/3.txt::6.text: I specifically got Friday tickets because Blink 182 is playing that day.

rock/3.txt::7.text: I LOVE Blink 182. They have so many great sing along songs.

rock/3.txt::8.text: I hope they play All The Small Things.

rock/3.txt::9.text: I like Adam's Song, even though it's incredibly sad.
